title.rendered: STEDI LED WORK LIGHT WIRING KIT LOOM HARNESS (NOT HIGH BEAM TRIGGERED)

content.rendered:
Work Light Wiring Kit / Loom

DETAILS

STEDI – Fully Assembled Wiring kit for LED Work Lights or camp lights.

It contains everything you need to get your lights connected. Press button ON/OFF switch. The included relay is rated to 40A so you can use the one wiring kit to connect several light bars to the one wiring loom.

Featuring a total of 4.8 meters of wiring (full stretched out)

  • 2.8m of cabling from Relay to Switch
  • 2.0m of cabling from light connectors to Relay
  • 12vDC 30A Rated Fuse Kit
  • 12vDC 40A Switching Relay
  • ON/OFF Switch
  • UV Rated Insulation

Please note that this harness is not high beam activated, please refer to our other listing for our High Beam Trigger light harnesses.

SPECIFICATIONS

WIRING KIT RATING 12vDC 30A
RELAY RATING 12vDC 40A
FUSE 30A
CABLE LENGTH 4.5m +or-
SWITCH TYPE Dime Switch
INSTRUCTION Included
RATED 30A

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 12v Work Light Wiring Kit
  • Waterproof Dime Switch

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI LED WORK LIGHT WIRING KIT LOOM HARNESS (NOT HIGH BEAM TRIGGERED)

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
